text: Coláiste an Phiarsaigh is a secondary school in Glanmire, County Cork for boys and girls. It has pupils who arrive each day and those who sleep there. The school uses the Irish language and expects teachers and pupils to also use this language. ==References== ==Other websites== * colaisteanphiarsaigh.ie School website Category:County Cork Category:Schools in Ireland
title: Coláiste an Phiarsaigh
